author: cms-PdmV
body:
- 13 TeV postLS1 relvals: added two new samples (RelValRSKKGluon_m3000GeV_13 and RelValPythia6_BuJpsiK_TuneZ2star_13) and consolidated the ones already exercised in 6_2_0_patch1
- added 13 TeV PROD workflows
- extended to 100k MinBias_13, and use it as a richer 'library' of  min-bias events for PU simulation
- add PU workflows at 13 TeV: AVE_10_BX_25ns_m8 and AVE_20_BX_50ns_m8
- add 4 extra PU scenarios in Mixing.py
- provisionally 25ns PU postLS1 samples point to hard coded POSTLS162_V2::All
title: Updates to relval Matrix and 4 extra PU scenarios
